content:
<kevaundray> re: **@shemnon**
> Is it better for zks to allocate transient memory one byte/word at a time or 4k at a time?
I think it would depend on the zkVM and how they've implemented the allocator.

- If you have a reth program with the EIP changes, we can benchmark it to find out (this is easier than going through each of their code)

- We also have this channel where you can ask your question: https://t.me/+qf2YcESRJdQ3NjBk
